name: E-commerce specialist (Gelendzhik Black Sea - Krasnodar Region)
description:
To fill the position, one of the following is required:

  • Knowledge of industry-specify terminology such as PPC, SEO, SEM etc.
  • A minimum of 1 year experience in web & electronic distribution
  • A proven track record of increasing traffic of a hotel website
  • Hotel operations and revenue management is a plus

Additionally:

  • Experience with web analytics tools (Urchin, Webtrends, Ominiture)
  • Experience using a CMS and an understanding of the impact they have on SEO
  • Knowledge of Google Adwords, Yahoo Search Marketing
  • Exсellent wrting skills in English and Russian

Key responsibilities:

  • Be proactive in achieving web traffic & revenue goals
  • To investigate systems malfunctions or user-input errors
  • To increase traffic of a hotel website, work with web reports
  • Analyze data, make meaningful conclusions and base sound decisions and strategies on these
  • To adapt to a frequently changing market environment. Be proactive and able to “think outside of the box”
  • Establishment and implementation of the hotel’s annual advertising plan for electronic channels

We offer competative salary, corporate benefits, worldwide development within Kempinski brand.
